Uses of Package
sheep.game

Packages that use sheep.game
sheep.collision Contains classes for collision detection, spatial partitioning and interfaces for collision events. 
sheep.game Contains classes related to game logic. 
 

Classes in sheep.game used by sheep.collision
Layer
          Abstract class for all Layers.
Sprite
          The Sprite represents superclass of the "models" of the game objects.
SpriteContainer
          An interface for classes which contains Sprites.
 

Classes in sheep.game used by sheep.game
Camera
          Can be attached to a World object and translate the entire scene according its position.
Game
          This class is subclass of SurfaceView, which makes it "viewable" in an Android application.
Layer
          Abstract class for all Layers.
Sprite
          The Sprite represents superclass of the "models" of the game objects.
SpriteContainer
          An interface for classes which contains Sprites.
State
          You should inherit from this class to create the various states for your game.
